title: AutoMagicIO not working (permission issues?)

milestone.title: Release 0.4.2
milestone.description: was never released -- will be absorbed into 0.5

body:
This command would fail due to missing annex'ed files:
````
$ python code/mk_ds.py 16 stupid                        
Traceback (most recent call last):
...
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nibabel/loadsave.py", line 40, in load
    raise FileNotFoundError("No such file: '%s'" % filename)
nibabel.py3k.FileNotFoundError: No such file: 'src/templatesntransforms/sub-16/spaghetti1/mask.nii.gz'
````

AutoMagicIO should come to the rescue...but doesn't:

````
$ python -m datalad code/mk_ds.py 16 stupid           
[INFO   ] Activating DataLad's AutoMagicIO 
[INFO   ] Running code of code/mk_ds.py 
[ERROR  ] <class 'git.exc.InvalidGitRepositoryError'>: /etc 
[WARNING] Failed proxying open with ('/home/mih/datalad/datalad.egg-info/PKG-INFO', 'rb'), {}: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/home/mih/datalad/.git/config.lock' [util.py:_obtain_lock_or_raise:758] 
[WARNING] Failed proxying open with ('/home/mih/datalad/datalad.egg-info/PKG-INFO', 'rb'), {}: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/home/mih/datalad/.git/config.lock' [util.py:_obtain_lock_or_raise:758] 
fatal: Not a valid object name src/aligned/sub-16/in_spaghetti1/sub-16_task-taste_run-1_bold.nii.gz
fatal: Not a valid object name src/aligned/sub-16/in_spaghetti1/sub-16_task-taste_run-1_bold.nii.gz
fatal: Not a valid object name src/aligned/sub-16/in_spaghetti1/sub-16_task-taste_run-1_bold.nii.gz
fatal: Not a valid object name src/templatesntransforms/sub-16/spaghetti1/mask_insula.nii.gz
fatal: Not a valid object name src/templatesntransforms/sub-16/spaghetti1/mask_insula.nii.gz
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 162, in _run_module_as_main
    "__main__", fname, loader, pkg_name)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 72, in _run_code
    exec code in run_globals
  File "/home/mih/datalad/datalad/__main__.py", line 102, in <module>
    main()
  File "/home/mih/datalad/datalad/__main__.py", line 93, in main
    runctx(code, globs, globs)
  File "/home/mih/datalad/datalad/__main__.py", line 41, in runctx
    exec(cmd, globals, locals)
  File "code/mk_ds.py", line 42, in <module>
    runs = [load_run(subid, runid) for runid in ('1', '2', '3', '4')]
  File "code/mk_ds.py", line 19, in load_run
    ds = fmri_dataset(bold_fname, mask=mask_fname)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/mvpa2/datasets/mri.py", line 258, in fmri_dataset
    maskimg = _load_anyimg(mask)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/mvpa2/datasets/mri.py", line 396, in _load_anyimg
    data = _img2data(src)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/mvpa2/datasets/mri.py", line 72, in _img2data
    img = nibabel.load(src)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nibabel/loadsave.py", line 48, in load
    filename)
nibabel.filebasedimages.ImageFileError: Cannot work out file type of "src/templatesntransforms/sub-16/spaghetti1/mask_insula.nii.gz"
````

This is using a datalad that was installed by different user as the one running the command. But write permissions shouldn't be necessary, right?

FTR: A manual

 ````
$ datalad get src/templatesntransforms/sub-16/spaghetti1/mask_insula.nii.gz
````

works as expected.
